LanguageData.storyTeller_Ivy.label: Ivy the Orphan(WIP)
LanguageData.storyTeller_Ivy.description:
As one of the earliest Sayers abandoned in the rim world, Ivy added its helpless sufferings to the stories it told. Ivy will make the colonists suffer more frequent attacks and threats, but it will push away people who can be friends, forcing the colonists to face this almost unreasonable world alone, just like it. However, it will also make the colonists stronger.
